mapper.select: select s.* FROM spot_check_task s WHERE s.task_state = #{taskState}
select * FROM spot_check_task s WHERE s.hm_id = #{id} AND s.task_state ='DOING'

select a.* from spot_check_task a left join hospitalmonitor b on b.id = a.hm_id left join hisinfo c on c.id = b.hisid where a.task_state ='DOING' and (b.type='01' OR b.type='05') and b.extractstatus=1 and EXISTS(select d.* from hisuserinfo d where token =#{hospitalmonitor.token} and d.dept=b.dept and d.hisid=c.id )
and b.name like concat('%',#{hospitalmonitor.name},'%')
and b.percode like concat('%',#{hospitalmonitor.percode},'%')
LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from spot_check_task a left join hospitalmonitor b on b.id = a.hm_id left join hisinfo c on c.id = b.hisid where a.task_state ='DOING' and (b.type='01' OR b.type='05') and EXISTS(select d.* from hisuserinfo d where token =#{token} and d.dept=b.dept and d.hisid=c.id )
and b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and b.percode like concat('%',#{percode},'%')
mapper.update: update spot_check_task a set a.task_state = 'CANCELLED' where a.hm_id=(select b.id from hospitalmonitor b where b.percode=#{percode} and (b.type='01' OR b.type='05') limit 1 ) and a.task_state ='DOING'
